headline: Is Deckers Outdoor (DECK) Pricing Reflect Its Mixed Returns And Earnings Multiple
summary: If you are wondering whether Deckers Outdoor is currently priced attractively or asking too much of future expectations, the next sections will walk through what the market price might be implying about the business. The stock last closed at US$99.98, with returns of a 0.7% decline over 7 days, a 1.0% decline over 30 days, a 6.4% decline year to date, a 54.0% decline over 1 year, but gains of 40.6% over 3 years and 105.5% over 5 years. This gives a mixed picture for anyone thinking about...
